Message.Title: It is about time for IBM to announce a 3 for 1 STOCK SPLIT !
Message.Msg: It is about time for IBM to announce a 3 for 1 STOCK SPLIT ! Price is right, growth is right, company not worth a sh.t towards employees (current and retiree), and it has no scruples.

The breakout took place a few years ago. This is more likely forming a top, IMHO. Now I don't have a position. I wouldn't want to be long above 210 and think this extra move up is more short covering, especially with IBM bull Cramer. I'm not short IBM as I am another tech stock now, but IMHO IBM is more likely to break down than break out to the upside.
BTW, I was long IBM in the past. Missing the last few points up is worth it if it means avoiding a sudden, steep down move in IBM.

Message.Title: BMC Software Rises on Report That It Hired Bank to Explore Sale
Message.Msg: BMC Software Inc. (BMC), a maker of software to manage corporate-computer networks, surged after the Wall Street Journal reported that it hired Bank of America Corp. (BAC) to explore a possible sale. The shares advanced as much as 8.5 percent to $45 after the report, which said private-equity firms may be among potential buyers. BMC Software has faced pressure to consider a sale from investor Elliott Associates LP. The software maker said in July that it would nominate two board directors chosen by Elliott.

DB raises estimates as they believe IBM will see accelerating hardware revenue growth. Where have we heard this before? International Business Machines Corp. (NYSE:IBM) estimates have been increased by Deutsche Bank raised its estimates for IBM due to expectations regarding the acceleration of near-term hardware growth because of the refreshed mainframe and a POWER7+ server refresh in early October. The firm keeps its Buy rating but increases its price target to $240 on the stock as it believes that the stock is attractively valued at current levels.
Split at 244. Ml

Message.Title: Obama's very first act as president, makes him look like someone with something to hide, not the person that swore that if elected, his administration would be the most OPEN presidential administration ever, you decide!
Message.Msg: Obama's very first act as president, makes him look like someone with something to hide, not the person that swore that if elected, his administration would be the most OPEN presidential administration ever, you decide! Obama's very first act as president was: To unequivocally SEAL EVERY RECORD ABOUT HIS PAST, from his birth, to schools he attended, to residences addresses he lived at, to colleges he attended, to grades he received, to degrees he received, to jobs he held, to affiliations in the Chicago area, to his political affiliations, yes Obama SEALED his entire past, as his very first act as president! Along with sealing his total past, Obama made it a 100% Firing Offense, for any government employee to dig into any record from his past! And the cover-ups continue, with Obama's administration being the most secret administration ever, dam shame that his perpetual lies & #$%$. convince many of the folks out there to give him a second chance for another four years... to destroy the Good Old U.S.A! One of Obama's latest is to give the new Muslim Brotherhood, that took over the Egyptian Government, $1 Billion In Aid That Obama Pledged to them, shortly after they gained control of the Egyptian Government! A short list of Obama Pledges, Prior to his election as President: 1) I will cut the Budget deficit in half in four years... ~ Result ~ Obama has added nearly $ 4 Trillion in New Debt, Yes, More Debt added in 4 Years than the First 41 Presidents Of the U.S.A. added, & yes, all piled on future generations... 2) I will make it easier to grow jobs... ~ Result ~ The Obama administration has implemented 2,000 NEW REGULATIONS that U.S. Industry must deal with, while world wide businesses coast onward, without such massive constraints on their operations, significantly reducing their ability to compete worldwide! 3) I will protect the environment... ~ Result ~ In the past 4 years, the Obama Administration has Closed or converted to natural gas 83 U.S. Coal Fired Power Plants, cutting thousands of jobs, raising the cost of Electricity & placing Millions of U.S. citizens in danger of electricity shortages in the near future... ~ Meanwhile, China Continues its relentless march onward, Opening ONE NEW COAL FIRED Power PLANT Each & EVERY WEEK, For the past two years, Yes in China alone... ~ Ask, how can U.S. Industry Compete, answer they ABSOLUTELY CANNOT, resulting in strangulation on U.S. growth & employment! 4) I will work to make the U.S. Energy Independent... ~ Vetoed the Keystone Pipeline From Canada, which would bring in Millions of Barrels of cheap Canadian Oil... ~ Refused to open & issue permits for U.S. Coastal Oil drilling, while Foreign Oil Companies encroach the U.S. Coastline, drilling away... ~ Placed massive restrictions on Mining & Use of Coal in the U.S.A., directing the Closure or conversion to natural gas of 83 U.S. Coal Fired Power Plants, cutting thousands of jobs, raising the cost of Electricity & placing Millions of U.S. citizens in danger of electricity shortages in the near future... ~ Funded a Billion $ for Renewable Energy, much of which has gone Bankrupt in the past several years... 5) I will implement stimulus programs, that will control unemployment to 8%... ~ Reported unemployment continues way above 8%, with unreported unemployment reported to be as high as 19%... 6) Added Two Million Federal Employees to the U.S. payroll, to over regulate U.S. Businesses & Citizens, all these NEW JOBS contributing ZERO Productivity to the U.S. economy, but adding to the mounting $ deficit... 6) Forced Obama Care Through, consisting of some 2,000 pages of which No Democrat that Voted for it, ever read it in it's entirety... Obama Care if not repealed, will Bankrupt The U.S.A. within several years of it's full enactment... 7) 45 Million U.S. Citizens on Food Stamps, documents the failure of the Obama administration to help the poor in the U.S.A., despite the massive Billions of $$$ being spent on social programs. Only significant job growth can resolve the U.S.'s economic problems & Obama cannot comprehend! 8) Look at Obama's background... Look at Obama's past & current associates... Look at Obama's accomplishments to date??? Now, you decide just what Obama has accomplished in his 4 year term & just was he attempting to hide with his very First ACT As President? Then Get Out & Vote Obama OUT!!!

Message.Title: IBD on IBM
Message.Msg: A band of big companies set new stock highs Monday, even as the major stock indexes erased or pared morning gains. The group included IBM (IBM), General Electric (GE), Visa (V), Home Depot (HD) and Grupo Financiero Santander Mexico (BSMX), the Mexican unit of Spain's Banco Santander (SAN). IBM led the pack, rising 1.5% Monday to 210.47 in strong volume, breaking out of a six-month base to a record high. The tech giant has transformed from a company that mainly sold computers and other tech products to a broad based provider of consulting and other services along with software and computer systems.
